original_text: And there were also two other, malefactors, led with him to be put to death.
korean_text: 또 다른 두 행악자도 사형을 받게 되어 예수와 함께 끌려 가니라

sentences.original_text: And there were also two other, malefactors,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다른 두 명의 죄수들도 있었고,

sentences.original_text: led with him to be put to death.
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 사형에 처해지기 위해 이끌려갔다.
